Einstein Service Replies for Email
Setting Up Service Replies for Email
Service Cloud Features

Service Cloud: Service Replies for Email in the Console
Service Replies for Email generates an email response based on knowledge articles relevant to your case. 

REQUIRED USER PERMISSIONS:
Allow users to share articles via public URLs, Edit on cases and Read on knowledge articles, Share internal Knowledge articles externally under Administrative Permissions.

To draft a response based on a Knowledge article, select Draft Einstein Email from the relevant article’s dropdown menu.
A draft is created in the email composer where you can review, edit, and send it. The draft merges the recipient's name from the associate case.

Einstein Service Replies for Email supports English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, and Spanish.
title: Service Cloud Einstein Email Replies
